name: Dynamic Ingest API
description: Reference for the Brightcove Dynamic Ingest API, used to add videos, images, and captions to your media library, and to replace existing media assets. To test API requests, you can use our [API Testing Tools](http://docs.brightcove.com/en/video-cloud/concepts/api-testing-tools/api-testing-tools.html)
title: Dynamic Ingest API Reference
